name: Raise Your Spirits
description:
A small game for Mini-Jam 55: Stealth

Sneak around as the ghost of Blue, while stealthily bringing Red things to cheer him up.

Controls: 

WASD to move

Mouse Left/Right to pan, Scroll  to zoom (Up/Down on standalone, cinemachine bug)

E: Pick Up/Throw

Space: Activate

O: Options

(The WebGL's music is quieter than the standalone, IDK why)
